Template.HtmlPart:
To Whom It May Concern,

Based on an internal investigation, our organization has found that the service at {{ip}} is likely to be hosting a phishing site being used for malicious purposes.

Here is a brief write-up and supporting evidence:
{{evidence}}

Our organization has a zero tolerance policy for phishing sites and we would like to request that you take down the site immediately.

Feel free to contact us at {{contact}} to follow-up.

Best Regards,
Open Government Products
